text.title: Tier List: Best Languages to Learn in 2024
text.p: so if you want something easy yet rare
impressive and foreign I highly
recommend Bulgarian for 2024 what are
the best languages to learn in the world
and Which languages should you learn in
2024 the new year has just begin so it's
time for my yearly language tier list in
this video I'll be ranking every single
language in the world on a scale of dog
water to gigachad and no one is going to
be offended but before I begin if you're
tired of being a monolingual beta and
you actually want to speak languages in
2024 I highly recommend that you click
the link in the description and sign up
for a free 7-Day trial of pimsler I
freaking love pimsler and if you start a
new language on it you'll be speaking
real words that have real meaning within
your first 30-minute session click the
link in the description for a free trial
and just cancel it before the 7 days is
up if you don't like it all right so
we're starting with Swedish meatball
Furniture Store PewDiePie language it's
the most feminine of the Nordic
languages it kind of sounds like I am
from Sweden Ika
y kind of like that little guy from Lord
of the Rings the way they say car is
really funny it's like bill I am in my
bill I used to not like it at all but in
2023 I met some people who love it and
it kind of grew on me mainly because
it's really easy to learn like seriously
it's probably one of the easiest for
Native Americans also most people who
learn Swedish live in Sweden which is
pretty cool it's definitely not the best
Nordic language but it could be worth
your time in 2024 it would have been dog
water in the past but I'm going to put
Swedish solidly in the average tier this
year now we've got Danish it's Viking
alpha male Nordic Kawaii theu language
it sounds amazing everyone says the
Danes sound like they have a potato in
their mouths but that's just beta males
coping and complaining cuz they can't
make the noise specifically the Glorious
soft D sound like in the word v v the D
is so soft they don't pronounce half the
letters in their words which is really
cool it reminds me of baguette language
it's super badass and it's by far the
best Nordic language and I'd say 2024 is
the year to learn Danish Danish goes
solidly in the gigachad tier now we've
got Norwegian The Fjord language also
known as discount Swedish I think it
sounds all right but it's just
repeatedly Alpha mogged by Danish and
dare I say it even Swedish unless you
had a Norwegian girlfriend boyfriend or
both I don't really see why you'd learn
it there's nothing inherently wrong with
it but Danish Swedish and Norwegian are
basically all the same but Danish and
Swedish have cooler features in my
opinion I don't think it's worth your
time in 2024 but we'll see what happens
in Norway in 2025 and I'll let you know
Norwegian goes in the dog water tier
moving on to German also known as angam
Merkel language Austrian discount
Turkish or angry language I've always
thought German sounded beautiful even
though people love to say it sounds
aggressive but come on betas every
language sounds aggressive when you
scream in it it has complicated Grammar
with cases but it's really satisfying
when you say things right there are tons
of Rich dialects the best of them
obviously being badish and it's the most
spoken language in Europe so it unlocks
a ton of DLC yeah Germans speak American
well but there's a loophole you can just
pretend like you're Turkish and they'll
switch back to German I love learning
German and I'm studying it right now so
I'm definitely biased but I think it's
an excellent option for 2024 I'm going
to put German in the alpha tier now
Dutch we've got Canal bicycle tall
people windmill language Dutch sounds
really harsh in my opinion with the hard
G sound
like you basically just take German and
remove all the cool Pizzazz and then you
have Dutch I definitely do like how
Flemish Dutch sounds in Belgium I think
it's very cute but if you want to learn
it for the Netherlands you got to keep
in mind that the country will be
underwater before the end of April 2024
also everyone there is going to be
taller than you and they're going to
speak American better than you do even
if you're a native you just don't unlock
that much DLC and you'll need throat
surgery after speaking it for one week
I'm going to put Dutch in the beta tier
ooh Romanian Dracula Numa Numa bisexual
language it's bisexual because it's a
romance language but it's also kind of a
Slavic language it's basically a hybrid
between Russian and Italian which is
really freaking cool for example the
word for yes is Da just like in Russian
but the grammar is extremely romancy it
has cases which are annoying but there
aren't that many so you'll only whine
about it if you are a monolingual beta a
lot of people say that Andrew Tate
ruined Romanian in 2023 but honestly
that guy is irrelevant and never even
studied the language it's a great lingo
to learn in 2024 also this is the first
language so far that will cause natives
to involuntarily do backflips if you
learn it Romanian goes solidly in the
gigachad tier oh
Arabic peace and love language Arabic is
by far the most beautiful language in
the Milky Way galaxy with the most
extravagant sounds that human beings
could ever even think to produce it has
a billion different dialects in tons of
different countries from Morocco to Oman
and back all the way to Palestine and
they're all beautiful in their own
unique ways you unlock so much DLC with
this language and you can dabble in
different dialects and have so much pure
Halal fun it's the language of Islam and
I really like Muslim Muslims cuz they're
really nice people and it's cool cuz
Muslims from across the world in places
like Indonesia also study Arabic to read
the Quran so there's just so much DLC my
favorite dialect is a generalization of
the Saudi accent I just feel like they
pronounce their eyes really strong and I
love it it's admittedly hard but it's so
worth it and I'm studying it on pimsler
and making better progress than I ever
have the alphabet is the most amazing
thing I've ever seen and they even write
backwards Arabic is the language of the
future so you should definitely take a
look at it in 2024 and Arabs look love
when you speak their language so
hopefully I'll be fluent one day
inshallah without a doubt Arabic belongs
in the gigachad tier moving to Cantonese
or Hong Kong language and that's really
the only nickname I have for it
Cantonese sounds really cool and unique
but it's just not super practical to
learn I mean it's really hard with the
tones and bajillion characters and I
just feel like anyone interested in
China is going to learn the elephant in
the room Mandarin before cantones
Mandarin just unlocks so much more DLC
cantones has 85 million speakers but
Mandarin has has over 1.1 freaking
billion Hong Kong is unique and chill
but I can only recommend the language in
2024 if you're a true Hong Kong simp or
you want to Sham masck people in a rarer
Chinese language it's controversial but
I'm going to put Cantonese in the beta
tier Ukrainian borch and zalinsky
language our first Slavic language and
we already have the goat Ukrainian is
written in the ceric alphabet but it's
more similar to polish than Russian the
alphabet has a sick eye with nipples on
it and there's no II to be found thank
God it sounds super badass but I think
it sounds less aggressive than other
Slavic languages it has a warm vibe to
it also ukrainians are absolute Giga
Chads who will really appreciate you
choosing to learn their language over
other Slavic choices I'd say it's a bit
harder than Russian for a few reasons
but ukrainians will appreciate the
effort and they'll start floating or
even astral projecting when you say
something as simple as preite if you
want a more Niche language to study in
2024 Ukrainian is an excellent choice I
put Ukrainian in the giga sh tier now
we've got Swahili or Kenyan Tanzanian or
east African language Swahili is the
lingua franka of East Africa spoken by
over 200 million people and I think it's
really slept on I mean I've literally
only met one person who studies Swahili
and he's from Ohio it's written in the
American alphabet which means it's super
approachable and it sounds really cool
and it's got a relaxing vibe to it I'm
actually getting really excited myself
about it right now I think it would be
awesome to learn in 2024 so maybe I'll
learn it while I'm sleeping the
grammar's quite intimidating though it's
in a glutena of language with tons of
prefixes and noun classes so it's
definitely not something you can
speedrun but Swahili speakers will do
triple back flips when you shock them so
it's kind of worth it I'm going to put
Swahili in the alpha tier now moving on
to Greek also known as philosophy
language democracy language or economy
language Greek sounds really nice it's
basically just Spanish from Spain in my
opinion but it's got a rougher Edge to
it which is quite enticing and no one
really learns it which is quite weird I
mean the Greek language has has been
very important for a long time and I
don't think I've ever met anyone who
learns Greek at least not to a good
level the alphabet was stolen from a
high school math text book so if you're
a nerd you might enjoy that but even
with my engineering degree I find it
rather off-putting it also has four
cases oh my goodness Greek delete the
cases you're not doing a good job at
convincing people to learn you and it
doesn't unlock that much DLC I mean
maybe Greece and Cypress but that's it a
few thousand years ago I would have
adamantly recommended Greek but even
though I love it I can't put it in the
gigachad tier in 2024 I can't even put
it in the alpha tier I have to put it in
the average tier Mongolian Mongol Empire
language or throat singing language
Mongolian sounds wild I mean I think
it's gorgeous but they've got this sound
that's kind of
like I don't know you just got to listen
for yourself they have multiple
alphabets I guess they can write in The
American cilic or their own gigachad
Mongolian script which I wish they stuck
to so it had more personality but I
think I see it mainly in cilic Mongolian
has certainly slept on it unlocks a
really cool country and I've never seen
anyone learn it I don't blame people for
not learning it though it's a glutena
with tons of suffixes and it has like
nine freaking cases I'm going to put
Mongolian in the average tier now we've
got Turkish which is the language of the
Ottoman Empire kebabs otherwise formerly
known as skibbidy Bop half Asia half
Europe language I flirted with Turkish
for about a month this year and I must
say it's very fun to learn it's a
glutena live but there are tons of
resources for it so it's not nearly as
intimidating as other languages like
Mongolian it sounds epic it's really
smooth yet powerful and Turkish people
were very nice to me when I studied it
it's in the American alphabet but it has
a cool eye without the dot which is
stylish as heck I think turkey is bound
to become a world superpower in 2024 so
I definitely think it's worth learning
and Turkish people will give you tons of
Kebabs and do somersaults even if you
speak it like a baby this year Turkish
goes in the gigachad tier now we have
Japanese otherwise known as anime manga
or technology language I'm not going to
lie after researching a bunch for my
Japanese language review video I
actually started to think the language
is quite interesting it sounds really
unique I'd say it sounds really Japanese
it looks like a really fun thing to
learn it's got three alphabets tons of
crazy grammar particles and a lot of
other tiny surprises like that but the
weebs man the weebs oh if Western
weeaboo culture didn't exist man H I'd
put it in the alpha category but H it's
got everything a language learner could
ask for tons of resources tons of DLC a
good challenge but I just can't do it
please help me guys how can I one day
learn Japanese and ignore Western
weeaboo culture Japanese goes in the dog
water tier Korean the language of Lil
Kimmy K-pop squid game and the company
Samsung Korean sounds pretty badass and
very overly dramatic like even when
people say hello onol it sounds like
they're saying something very profound
and extravagant people love to say that
the alphabet is super easy but I just
don't believe it it's circles and lines
and little trees and I feel like that
must get old after a while South Korean
Korean is me but I'm going to come out
of the closet right now as a twice stand
so it does have something going for it
North Korean Korean however that
slaps it's the forbidden fruit language
and I'm pretty sure Lil Kimmy has
something up his sleeve for 2024 imagine
how cool it would be to learn North
Korean Korean and preparation for when
North Korea inevitably opens up their
borders for tourism North Koreans would
be convulsing and doing quadruple
somersaults when you shock them I put
Korean in the average tier time for
Russian otherwise known as nightmare
language I have never loved the language
so much and hated it so much at the same
time Russian is super gorgeous both
written and spoken but it's physically
painful to learn and not just because of
my eye problem it's just so freaking
difficult Russian grammar nah I repeat
ID nahi Russian grammar the case system
coupled with the alphabet makes me want
to grab a piece of cardboard and Float
out to sea until the seabirds get me but
there is no better feeling in the world
than when I speak Russian for a few
minutes and I realize that I used
perfect grammar perfect word stret dress
and a half decent accent the entire
thing is a stressful puzzle but it's so
worth it because of the Soviet Union
Russian unlocks so much DLC from
usbekistan all the way to lva with so
much in between if you don't speak
Russian you have to start learning it in
2024 it's not my main focus but I just
do a pimsler lesson a day on it and I'm
still making progress without reading
mashaallah I put Russian in the gigachad
tier moving on to polish dancing cow F
booy Wi-Fi password kurva language I
spent about a week in Poland this year
and it was such an amazing experience I
always knew the language was cool but
after hearing it for a while I
completely fell in love it sounds so
dope it's a language written in the
American alphabet with nasal sounds like
French but a harsh Slavic Edge like
Russian oh I just love it the only
reason I'm not grinding it is because I
can't cheat on Russian with Polish until
my Russian is at a D1 level polish looks
insane and there are 4 million cases and
4 million consent clusters but it's so
worth learning you'll never pronounce it
well but that's good cuz you'll sound so
cool and foreign when you go to speak it
this might be the language of 2024 guys
you should all study it and maybe I'll
get back to it this year inshallah
polish goes in the gigachad tier
Hungarian I have no nicknames for this

language I also spent a week in Hungary
this year and it is a really beautiful

grammatical cases which is a nightmare
Russian is insanely tough but it only
has six and there are only 13 million

unlock that much DLC it also sounds
pretty nice but I can't with a good

that being said if you do learn it in
2024 you'll be very unique and cool as
it takes a true Sigma gigachad to
navigate the 18 cases and learn a
language with little resources I put
Hungarian in the beta tier Spanish

dios mues language or taco language I
learned Spanish back in 2020 to a pretty
good level but I wouldn't run around

the thing is I really lost interest in

to shock Natives and make them do back
flips they will appreciate you speaking
it but they won't really do back flips I
still do love it it's gorgeous and
unlocks communication with like a
billion NPCs and I really do want to

Spanish music and cut my legs off for J
vas it's hard not to recommend Spanish
in 2024 most native speakers don't speak
American so it's just so much bang for

just remember Cuban Spanish is off the
list I don't think they actually even

Nordic language despite hanging up there
with Sweden the language of Finland

like Hungarian so it's super freaking
hard with 15 cases my goodness but I

enticing than Hungarian I just feel like
Finland has some more things going for

snow if you're into that type of thing
but there's only 5 million speakers so
you don't get any DLC even though you
have to grind your ass off for years to

got this fancy Rhythm that I've never
heard in any other language and for that
reason it is on my list you'd be a
really cool Sigma individual if you got
to a decent level in finish in 2024 but
with the lack of DLC I'm going to put it
in the average tier Hindi Modi baharat
Bollywood language Hindi is a huge
language spoken by hundreds of millions

a look at I studied it very early this

annoying because Indians can't agree on
how to properly speak their own language
I'd be studying with six native Hindi
[Music]
speak how much crime has happened
happening I'd be studying with six
native Hindi speakers in one call and
they would all disagree on the most
simple trivial things also they add way
too much American into their language
basically every fifth word they say it
in American when I speak a foreign
language I want to speak the foreign
language not my native language the
alphabet is awesome and I love how they
connect the letters at the top with a
line it's quite unique but it's not my
favorite alphabet cuz I think it's

I'm going to put Hindi in the alpha tier
erdu otherwise known as Pakistani
language Urdu is literally the exact

my favorite writing system so honestly I
think erdu mogs Hindi and that's not to

learner's perspective the erdu script is
much easier to learn as long as you can
get comfortable reading backwards and
Pakistan is a sick place I want to go to
Islamabad so bad I've never personally
noticed an accent difference between
India and Pakistan but I'm not good at
Hindi or Urdu so please let me know if
there is one erdu belongs in the
gigachad tier Indonesian otherwise known
as Bali language or Obama language yes
Barack Obama speaks Indonesian look it
up there's a ton of propaganda about
Indonesian and the online language
learning community and I'm here to clear
it up I've seen videos and articles
talking about how Indonesian is the
easiest language to learn in the world
but that is so false it's such a lant
lie yes it does have simple
pronunciation and yes it does have some
easy elements like to say plurals you
just repeat the word for example cows
would be cow cow but Indonesians speak
at the speed of light and there aren't
going to be many cognates with your cute
little European languages you've been
collecting however there are hundreds of
millions of NPCs in Indonesia so it is
worth your time in 2024 it sounds nice
it's just really fast and mumbled I'm
going to put Indonesian in the alpha
tier this year Bulgarian also known as
bulg or bulge easy Russian or Nina doev
language Bulgarian is a secret loophole
in the Slavic speaking world that the
language Elites wouldn't want me to tell
you about but I'm going to anyway
Bulgarian is written in the cerlic
alphabet so it looks badass and it
sounds badass like other Slavic
languages but it's so much easier than
every other language in the family and
that's because Bulgarian doesn't have
cases it just doesn't have cases like
every other Slavic lingo it's an anomaly
but no one knows that and most people
can't point to bulgar on a map so you
could become a very interesting and
impressive person in no time if you
learn it so if you want something easy
yet rare impressive and foreign I highly
recommend Bulgarian for 2024 Bulgarian
goes in the alpha tier British is awful
I will gladly put it in the dogwater
tier Vietnamese otherwise known as faux
language easy Asian or horrible American
intervention language Vietnamese is
difficult to learn but they were nice

for foreigners given how difficult it is
it's got six tones which which is a lot
even for a tonal language but it's
written in the American alphabet and
they denote which tone you need to use
right on top of each word so if you want
to learn a tonal Asian language but not
deal with a million characters and
guessing tones Vietnamese is a great
option it's really commonly called one
of the ugliest languages on

pretty and has a nice yet admittedly
choppy Rhythm this is a backflip
language Vietnamese people's Jaws will
drop if you surprise them with decent
